page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: Our 4km x 3km block is on the Island of{Sanday in Orkney.}Most of the land cover is{intensively managed {grassland;}either used for pasture or for cutting as silage or hay. Our block contains one of the two built-up areas -{Kettletoft 'Village'.}Most of the{amenities}for the Island are to be found in the region: e.g., shop, bakery, guest house, garage, Post Office, bank, hotel, restaurant, - down at Kettletoft.{Communication}- the pier and the airfield are in our area.{Education}- the school is in our block. Our area also contains Bea Loch, which is the island's{water {supply}(reservoir) . Being on an island part of the area is sea and shore-line. Most of the population either are{fishermen or farmers.
